Literature.Title: De novo design of selective antibiotic peptides by incorporation of unnatural amino acids.
Literature.Author: Hicks RP, Bhonsle JB, Venugopal D, Koser BW, Magill AJ

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:6% Hemolysis=100 µM,Human erythrocytes:4% Hemolysis=25 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 13311(MIC=220µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33592(no activity data),Mycobacterium fortuitum ATCC 110(MIC=66µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 43223(MIC=22µg/ml)
